mapper.select: SELECT U.NAME, U.NICKNAME, U.BIRTH_DAY, I.IMG_URL AS USER_IMG, CO.COUPLE_DATE, CO.START_DATE, CO.SUB_TERM, CO.USER_REQUEST, CO.USER_RECEIVED, CO.IMG_URL AS COUPLE_IMG FROM USER_INFO U JOIN IMG I ON U.IMG_ID = I.IMG_ID JOIN (SELECT C.COUPLE_DATE, C.START_DATE, C.SUB_TERM, C.USER_REQUEST, C.USER_RECEIVED, M.IMG_URL FROM COUPLE_INFO C JOIN IMG M ON C.IMG_ID = M.IMG_ID) CO ON U.USER_ID IN(CO.USER_REQUEST, CO.USER_RECEIVED) WHERE USER_ID=#{userId}
